verses.verse: Give ear <S%H238><s%> to my words <S%H561><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, consider <S%H995><s%> my meditation <S%H1901><s%>.
Listen <S%H7181><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my cry <S%H7773><s%>, my King <S%H4428><s%>, and my God <S%H430><s%>: for unto you will I pray <S%H6419><s%>.

My voice <S%H6963><s%> shall you hear <S%H8085><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>; in the morning <S%H1242><s%> will I direct <S%H6186><s%> my prayer unto you <S%H6822><s%>, and will look up.
For you are not a God <S%H410><s%> that has pleasure <S%H2655><s%> in wickedness <S%H7562><s%>: neither shall evil <S%H7451><s%> live with you <S%H1481><s%>.
The foolish <S%H1984><s%> shall not stand <S%H3320><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%>: you hate <S%H8130><s%> all workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>.

You shall destroy <S%H6><s%> them that speak <S%H1696><s%> falsehood <S%H3577><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will abhor <S%H8581><s%> the bloody <S%H1818><s%> and deceitful <S%H4820><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.

But as for me <S%H935><s%>, I will come into your house <S%H1004><s%> in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your mercy <S%H2617><s%>: and in your fear <S%H3374><s%> will I worship <S%H7812><s%> toward your holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>.
Lead <S%H5148><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, in your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> because of my enemies <S%H8324><s%>; make your way <S%H1870><s%> straight <S%H3474><s%> before my face <S%H6440><s%>.

For there is no faithfulness <S%H3559><s%> in their mouth <S%H6310><s%>; their inward <S%H7130><s%> part is very wickedness <S%H1942><s%>; their throat <S%H1627><s%> is an open <S%H6605><s%> tomb <S%H6913><s%>; they flatter <S%H2505><s%> with their tongue <S%H3956><s%>.

Destroy <S%H816><s%> you them <S%H430><s%>, O God; let them fall <S%H5307><s%> by their own counsels <S%H4156><s%>; cast them out <S%H5080><s%> in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of their transgressions <S%H6588><s%>; for they have rebelled against you <S%H4784><s%>.

But let all those that put their trust <S%H2620><s%> in you rejoice <S%H8055><s%>: let them ever <S%H5769><s%> shout for joy <S%H7442><s%>, because you defend <S%H5526><s%> them <S%H157><s%>: let them also that love your name <S%H8034><s%> be joyful in you <S%H5970><s%>.
For you <S%H3068><s%>, Lord, will bless <S%H1288><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>; with favor <S%H7522><s%> will you compass <S%H5849><s%> him as with a shield <S%H6793><s%>.
